column4: guys, can I just check with you, all the bugs in kubuntu go onto the ubuntu launchpad, don't they?
Kubuntu like to report things upstream if it's a KDE issue. Ask #kubuntu-devel
I've discovered a very severe security bug in kubuntu 11.04, and want to speak to a dev about it in pm if possible, tardis - I don't know if it's just a KDE bug or not.
pay a visit to the aforementioned channel, then ;)
I'm in there, I've asked and nobody is responding
It's 2.45 am, and I need to get some sleep soon :)   I don't know how much patience a tired guy has!
i'm guessing it's not a lot if I'm anything to go by
there's a channel here for mint support, cypher - but there's only 2 people in it right now
try ##mint the next time you come on

##mint                                               2 :Welcome to the Linux Mint support channel. | Linux Mint site- http://www.linuxmint.com/ | New release: Linux Mint 10 RC - http://linuxmint.com/rel_julia_whatsnew.php
that isn't the Linux Mint support channel.
even the name of it (two hashes) makes that obvious ;)
ok then, I can only go by what I see in the alis listings, if it's not official it should be shut
that's not what freenode policy says :)
